fields.description: Executes renaming for the remaining employees mentioned in the table.
fields.label: Migrate Remaining Employees

fields.description: Populates the remaining employees table with the list of records whose rename is still pending.
fields.label: Get Remaining Employees

fields.options:
Migrator to rename Employee records from Employee ID (13 digits) to Employee PK (7 digits) and use Employee PK as naming series.
This migrator renames existing employee records only.
Before using the migrator, add the below custom queue in common_site_config.json.

    "workers": {

        "migration": {

            "background_workers": 1,

            "timeout": 5000

        }

    }
Then run the below commands for the changes to take place.
1. bench setup supervisor
2. sudo supervisorctl reread
3. sudo supervisorctl update
4. bench restart
